post:
I am proud to announce our newest project **Spacecow**!

We at Servercow want you to get access to the latest and coolest technologies.
**Virtkick** is one of those projects and was long-awaited!

Virtkick does not rely on old container-based virtualization (OpenVZ), but makes use of proper kernel-based virtualization via KVM.

* Create virtual machines in 5 clicks.
* Virtkick looks and feels like a mobile app. And works on tablets and phones as well.

**Everybody loves screenshots**
![Screenshot 1](https://www.servercow.de/img/vkick1_live.png)
![Screenshot 1](https://www.servercow.de/img/vkick2_live.png)
![Screenshot 1](https://www.servercow.de/img/vkick3_live.png)

**Plans**

![Our plans](https://www.servercow.de/img/vkick_plans.png)

You get...

- a fair-use bandwidth flat @ 1 Gbit/s + IPv4

- a premium location @ Frankfurt/Main in Germany

- professional server hardware, no desktop hardware

- hardware RAID10 with SAS disks

- Intel Xeon CPU + ECC RAM


Visit us @ www.servercow.de/virtkick for more information (German)

**[Register for Spacecow now!](https://servercow.myvirtkick.com/)**

Feel free to contact us at info@servercow.de or just leave us a private message at LowEndTalk.

André,

Servercow
